comment: Yeqing was always eager to help me and responded to emails incredibly quickly. She is clearly a caring person and encourages deep thinking.
Yeqing Kong is an incredibly caring person and always responds quickly and politely. She sends us reminders often so I can tell she wants us to succeed.
Ms. Kong is a nice, professional instructor. Her teaching is fantastic and I wouldn't hesitate to take her again!
While this is an online class the instructor made it known that she was will to help us in any way possible and was very prompt at responding to students questions.
I really enjoyed this course and felt like I recieved a solid introduction to environmental ethics. The subject matter was broad and engaging.
I really enjoyed the design of this course. It was easy to understand, the material was free and informative, and I always knew what was expected of me.
The format of this class was perfect for distance education. Very well laid out and streamlined.
She is really nice. As an instructor, she was really patient and friendly to students, and was always happy to help.
This was a really interesting course and you made it enjoyable!
Yequing was really attentive and provided a lot of information for the course. She was also very organized.
The course really helped me understand the importance of writing in the sciences and the intricacies within it.
Everything was great about the course and I genuinely had an enjoyable time.
She did a really great job! I like the weekly posts! They are engaging and help improve your grade :)
Ms. Kong was a great instructor and was very responsive to emails when questions arose.
Very interactive course with other peers
